name: OutRunTest
description:
This is a test for some mechanics I want to implement into a future game that I am working on with my friends. So this will not be the complete game. Please let me know if you have any feedback on how the flying could be better

Air:

  • Use "w" and "s" to tilt down and up
  • Use "a" and "d" to turn left and right
  • Use "q" and "e" to rotate
  • Use "r" to reset the game
  • Use "left shift" to boost

Ground:

  • Use "w" to move forward
  • Use "a" and "d" to turn left and right
  • Use "left shift" to sprint

Use "space" to jump back in the air while on the ground
